Movie Info

Plot: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, 
 only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too. 
 IMDB:  <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1298650/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1298650/</a>
 IMDB Rating: 7.2

Encoders Notes

Well, i cut the source into 30 parts & i encoded each part seperatley.
 I tried to make the dark parts view-able & keep the quality of the daylight parts.
 I didnt brighten the dark parts as much as some people did.
 The film is set pre-electricity times & candle light isnt great...
 I also tried to keep the quality of the dark parts & i think i did in most of them.
 The daylight parts where already fairly good, so i mostly sharpned, changed the colors,
 added saturation & sometimes added contrast to them.
 I watched it on my 52" TV via a PS3 & it looks prety good, although i wouldnt
 realy advise you to watch a cam/ts on a tv bigger than 32".
 The audio looked in sync threw out.
 Ive included 2 sample's, 1 of a daylight scene & 1 of a dark scene.
 Here is a screenshot comparison beetween mine & Hive-Cm8's.
 <a href=" http://screenshotcomparison.com/comparison/53689" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://screenshotcomparison.com/comparison/53689</a>
 Im sorry its realy late, but alot of time & effort went into it (just under 3 days!)
 I did try & include the final scene (after the end credits) but when i made my scipt it said it had a different framerate.
 (& thats after i converted it from 25FPS to 23.976FPS) 
 So ive included it in a folder (for those that want it).
 Enjoy...



I am looking for:

 Cammers, Cams, Screeners (any type), Cam audio, Line audio, 
 Un-released R6's R5's R4's R2's R1's,
